Reviews.Title: Amazing value!
Reviews.Author: BrownieMoose
Reviews.Content: I got the Canon to replace an outdated SLR that I have been using for years.  After countless hours of research I decided on the Canon T5i.  The additional lenses alone cost several hundred dollars so I was pleased to see the extra lens was included in this package  The lens (55-250) is genuine Canon.  Works GREAT!!  Was not totally pleased with the extra flash.  It's not genuine Canon, that's for sure.  However, extra battery charger and the side shutter is AMAZING!!  The other gadgets and gizmos were a nice treat.  I will also note the wireless flash is not 100% compatible with all the features of the camera.  (Only instant shutter release, no 10 second delay as offered on the camera itself.)  All in all I can't complain and I stand firm on my 5 star rating.  Great value for sure!  (And packaged well also!!)
